questions.question_text_1: Identify the examples for Offshoring from the list below:
question_texts: Identify the examples for Offshoring from the list below:

options.option_text: Shell, an oil company based in Netherlands, setting up a data science team inIndia.
Western Australia’s electricity network agency assigns Tata ConsultancyServices at Pune, to support it with an overhaul of its legacy IT systems, aimed at delivering cheaper and more reliable power.
Target Corporation, a retail giant based in US, setting up Supply ChainOptimization team at Bengaluru.
Tata Motors assigns the manufacturing of its braking system to TACO group.

questions.question_text_1: Select the correct statements from below:
question_texts: Select the correct statements from below:

Optimal solution in a facility location problem using Euclidean method rarelymatches the center of gravity
Optimal solution in a facility location problem using Euclidean method willresult in a point
Optimal solution in a facility location problem using Euclidean methodmatches the center of gravity in not of the cases

questions.question_text_1: There are four demand points at A(1,2), B(2,3), C(3,5), D(4,1). The respective demand at these points are 7, 1, 3, 5. Select the optimal location based on cross-median approach.
question_texts: There are four demand points at A(1,2), B(2,3), C(3,5), D(4,1). The respective demand at these points are 7, 1, 3, 5. Select the optimal location based on cross-median approach.

questions.question_text_1: A factory works for two 8-hour shifts each day and produces a total of 30,000 electric bulbs using a set of workstations.
